sentences.en: His classical urbanity comes to his relief -- if one can attribute urbanity to a former Agrarian.
sentences.cn: 是他的古典的优雅风格挽救了他, 如果我们可以用优雅这两个字来形容过去的重农主者的话.

sentences.en: I had always been aware of a frame of malevolence under his urbanity.
sentences.cn: 我常常觉察到,在他温文尔雅的下面掩藏着一种恶意.

sentences.en: Outside New England, a comparable urbanity could be found.
sentences.cn: 新英格兰以外的地区也有相当典雅的作品.

sentences.en: The film compares the streamlined urbanity of the visitors with the homely simplicity of the villagers.
sentences.cn: 电影将来访者高效的城市生活与村民们朴素简单的农家生活做了比较.

sentences.en: The hostess presided at table with tact and urbanity.
sentences.cn: 女主人招待客人进餐时风雅而又得体.

sentences.en: There is an important difference between rusticity and urbanity.
sentences.cn: 朴实和文雅之间有很大的差别.

words.tran_cn: 彬彬有礼的，温文尔雅的；都市化的
